title: The Great English-Polish Polish-English dictionary PWN OXFORD v3
description:
Arguably the best general vocabulary English-Polish Polish-English dictionary with examples, born out of the cooperation of Oxford and PWN.

The Great Multimedia English-Polish Polish-English dictionary (Wielki multimedialny sÃ…â€šownik angielsko polski polsko angielski) PWN Oxford v3.0 2007 in Stardict format for ANDROID and other platforms using appropriate software.

To date (December 2014), Polish Scientific Publishers (PWN) has not released a version of this dictionary for Android or other platforms other than Windows. The dictionary databases were taken from the Windows version and converted to Stardict using the python script available on-line.

In order to run the dictionary on an Android system, you must:

1. Install a stardict-supporting program from Google Play - I recommend GoldenDict
2. Open GoldenDict on the phone - the program will create a folder named "GoldenDict" in the main directory of the phone's memory. Close the program.
3. Unrar all the 6 files to said folder.
4. Open the GoldenDict application again.

If you like, you may mess with the settings - they are very easy to use.

Works on Nexus 5 running Android 5.0 Lollipop.


Note. Not all Android phones (say, the N5) have a file manager. In order to perform the above steps, you may need to install e.g. ES File Explorer.
